channel.title: r on Text Mining for Information Professionals
channel.description: Recent content in r on Text Mining for Information Professionals

item.title: Clustering
item.description: About Chapter 1: The Computational Library covers the case study on Clustering of Documents using Two Different Tools. It is divided into two parts: 1A, and 1B. 1A case study uses Orange tool whereas 1B case study uses R programming language to perform clustering. The RStudio and Jupyter Notebook are associated with 1B case study. For corrections/suggestions reach me at lambamanika07@gmail.com or create an issue here.
